Name: Christmas Special No. 1
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Garnish with half walnut balanced on rim or rest on the ice.
Review: A great after-dinner cocktail any time of year but particularly appropriate over the festive period due to its ingredients – Pedro Ximénez sherry tastes like Christmas pudding, mandarins are not just for Christmas and walnuts are best cracked whilst watching a Christmas special.
History: Created in December 2013 by yours truly and Paloma Alos at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Christmas Special No. 1 contains 219 calories
